metadata.title: CVE-2023-0668 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Due to failure in validating the length provided by an attacker-craftedIEEE-C37.118 packet, Wireshark version 4.0.5 and prior, by default, issusceptible to a heap-based buffer overflow, and possibly code execution inthe context of the process running Wireshark.

criterions.comment: wireshark package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
